title: Best of The Herd for Mar 30, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 30, 2020
description:
The media's perception of Cam Newton is much better than reality

Only bad NFL GMs will use the lack of meetings with draft prospects as an excuse 

Using one location for the remainder of the NBA season is a good idea

Colin admits where he was right and wrong over the last week

Guest: Bob Costas, Sportscasting Legend

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
